page.title: 11A TYPICAL SUNDAY
page.content: We have surveyed 270 children in our school.We asked these questions Do you go to church? 65 people do. Do you go out?100 people do. Do you have roast dinners?143 people do. Then we asked if they did not do these 13 People seldom go out 15 people seldom have roast dinners We found in talking to people that many people visit relations on a Sunday or go to the beach in summer or go for a drive in their cars.They may go to the cliffs or some other beauty spot.Some people enjoy hiking,playing tennis,football or some other game if the weather is fine.Others prefer to relax and watch T.V. Quite a few children said that their fathers go out to a pub or a club to play darts,snooker or card games on a Sunday evening.
